amia's newer more metalic frame with an obvious

loyal servants." He took a moment to=

are ready for active duty." he said as h=
e set the scanner back down on
a control panel, the strange lighting of thi=
s room sometimes giving

lighter in spots.

Dirge turned his powerful and arresting=

insectors are being sent to investigate an =
old crash site." he said as

them. This will give them time to get to know you as w=
ell as get used
